item.title: LOBs
item.description: This page contains information and simple code examples about dealing with LOBs (CLOBs and BLOBs) in SQL statements. CLOB/BLOB length To find out the length of a LOB object you can use the DBMS_LOB.getLength function: Select up.*, DBMS_LOB.getLength(up.stage_layout) as "BLOB_LENGTH" from ui_properties up where up.stage_layout is not null order by "BLOB_LENGTH" desc; Converting BLOB to CLOB - No truncation Unfortunately there is no built in function that will do this conversion that does not have a length restriction on it.
